entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
